law.catch_line: Each employer shall keep each record that the Commissioner requires on:...

section.section:
Each employer shall keep each record that the Commissioner requires on:
wages of employees;
job classifications of employees; and
other conditions of employment.
An employer shall keep the records required under this subsection for the period of time that the Commissioner requires.

text.section: On the basis of the records required under this section, an employer shall make each report that the Commissioner requires.
